snippet: President Michael D. Higgins has signed into law a bill legalizing abortion, though only in exceptional cases where doctors deem a woman’s life is at risk.
abstract: President Michael D Higgins of Ireland signs into law  bill legalizing abortion, though only in exceptional cases where doctors deem a woman’s life is at risk.
lead_paragraph: President Michael D. Higgins has signed into law a bill legalizing abortion, though only in exceptional cases where doctors deem a woman’s life is at risk.

headline.main: Abortion Bill Becomes Law in Ireland
